name: Extruder's Molybdenum Crash Helmet
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Action Probability Estimator drops in Sector 13 and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" #L "Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Helmet" "252017" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Action Probability Estimator + Kegern's Molybdenum Plate Helmet = #L "Extruder's Molybdenum Crash Helmet" "257379" Note: Omni Helmet
